trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma assinatura digital é aplicada a um conjunto de partes do pacote e relações.

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto PackageDigitalSignature é imutável e não pode ser alterado depois que ela é criada.

trans-unit.source: For security, a PackageDigitalSignature can be associated with parts within a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Para segurança, um PackageDigitalSignature pode ser associada a partes em <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: A PackageDigitalSignature incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part.
trans-unit.target: Um PackageDigitalSignature incorpora um certificado x.&509; que fornece dois recursos: - identifica e autentica a origem da parte.

trans-unit.source: - Validates that the part has not been modified.
trans-unit.target: -Valida que a parte não foi modificada.

trans-unit.source: The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital não impeçam a parte que está sendo modificada, mas uma verificação de validação em relação à assinatura falhará se a parte foi alterado de alguma forma.

trans-unit.source: The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode adotar a ação adequada — por exemplo, ele pode impedir que a parte de abertura ou pode notificar o usuário que a parte foi modificada e não é segura.

trans-unit.source: For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre assinaturas digitais de pacote, consulte o artigo do MSDN [estrutura de assinaturas digitais de Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o certificado x.&509; incorporação de opção.

trans-unit.source: X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|In its own certificate <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> in the package.
trans-unit.target: Certificados x.&509; usados para validar um pacote podem ser armazenados em um dos três locais: | | | |-|-| | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Em seu próprio certificado <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>no pacote.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|Within the content of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> in the package.
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; pode ser obtido por meio da propriedade <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| No conteúdo do <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A>no pacote.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SignaturePart%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A> property.| |<xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>|External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|
trans-unit.target: O certificado x.&509; pode ser obtido por meio da propriedade <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>. | | <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>| Externos ao pacote em um local conhecido, o aplicativo que cria a assinatura e o aplicativo que usa mais tarde a assinatura para validação. |</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signer%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"></xref> values that specifies the option for the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption"> </xref> valores que especifica a opção para a assinatura digital.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Returns an ordered list of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"></xref> operations applied to a given part.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma lista ordenada do <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Transform"> </xref> operações aplicado a uma determinada peça.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the transform list for.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>do <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> para retornar a lista de transformação de loop for</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: An ordered list of URI strings, such as or , that represents the canonical XML transformations applied to the part with the given partName URI.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista ordenada de URI cadeias de caracteres, como ou , que representa as transformações XML canônicas aplicadas à parte com o determinado partName URI.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: Signature provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that hosts the signature.
trans-unit.target: Assinatura fornece acesso para a classe base que executa a serialização e funções de criptografia de assinatura de um tipo específico de e para o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>que hospeda a assinatura.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital XML.

trans-unit.source: The digital Signature has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: A assinatura digital foi excluída.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> que contém a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The signature's package part is frequently accessed when the signature is countersigned.
trans-unit.target: Parte do pacote da assinatura é acessado com frequência quando a assinatura é referendada.

trans-unit.source: The package part that contains the signature.
trans-unit.target: A parte do pacote que contém a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] cadeia de caracteres que identifica o tipo de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: Um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] cadeia de caracteres que identifica o tipo de assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor de hash criptografado de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the encrypted hash value of the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de bytes que contém o valor de hash criptografado de <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> objects signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de todos os <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> objetos assinado com a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the package parts signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção que contém todas as partes do pacote é assinado com a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a lista da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> partes que foram assinados com a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The list of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> parts that have been signed with the signature.
trans-unit.target: A lista da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"> </xref> partes que foram assinados com a assinatura.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o certificado x.&509; do assinante.

trans-unit.source: Signer returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> or <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Signatário retorna o certificado x.&509; do assinante quando o certificado digital é armazenado dentro do pacote (isto é, quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>é <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>ou <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: Signer returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A> is <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).
trans-unit.target: Retorna signatário `null` quando o certificado x.&509; não é armazenado no pacote (isto é, quando <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>é <xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption>).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.CertificateEmbeddingOption> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.CertificateEmbeddingOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The digital certificate of the signer, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the certificate is not stored in the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O certificado digital do assinante, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o certificado não é armazenado no <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a data e a hora em que a assinatura foi criada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A> property specifies the format of the date.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>propriedade especifica o formato da data.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.TimeFormat%2A>

trans-unit.source: The format of the SigningTime string is based on the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in effect when the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: O formato da cadeia de caracteres SigningTime se baseia o <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade em vigor quando a assinatura foi criada.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignatureManager.TimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime baseia-se na hora do sistema do computador em que a assinatura foi feita.

trans-unit.source: SigningTime is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: SigningTime não é um "carimbo de hora seguro" e não é de autoridade confiável de carimbo de data / hora.

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: Um carimbo de hora seguro deve ser obtido e aplicado por meio de uma autoridade confiável de carimbo de data / hora.

trans-unit.source: The date and time that the signature was created.
trans-unit.target: A data e hora em que a assinatura foi criada.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o formato de data e hora retornados pelo <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>propriedade.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note.
trans-unit.target: Data/hora formatos seguem a sintaxe do W3C [formatos de data e hora](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) Observação.

trans-unit.source: The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown.
trans-unit.target: Os componentes mostrados na tabela a seguir devem usar a sintaxe e pontuação mostrado.

trans-unit.source: |TimeFormat|Description|Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYY|Year|2005| |YYYY-MM|Year and month|2005-07| |YYYY-MM-DD|Complete date|2005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| where: ||| |-|-| |YYYY|four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MM|two-digit month (01=January)| |DD|two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |Thh|two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mm|two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ss|two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |s|one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZD|time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|
trans-unit.target: | TimeFormat | Descrição | Exemplo | |----------------|-----------------|-------------| | AAAA | Ano | 2005 | | AAAA-MM | Ano e mês | 2005-07 | | AAAA-MM-DD | Data de conclusão | 2005-07-28 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mmTZD | Concluir a data mais horas e minutos | 2005-07-28T19:20-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD | Concluir a data mais horas, minutos e segundos | 2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00 | | AAAA-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD| Concluir a data mais horas, minutos e segundos com uma fração decimal | 2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00 | onde: | | | |-|-| | AAAA | ano de quatro dígitos (por exemplo, 2006) | | MM | mês de dois dígitos (01 = janeiro) | | DD | dia de dois dígitos do mês (01 a 31) | | Thh | hora de dois dígitos (de 00 a 23, 24 horas) | | mm | dois dígitos de minutos (de 00 a 59) | | ss | dois dígitos de segundos (de 00 a 59) | | s | um ou mais dígitos que representa uma fração decimal de um segundo | | TZD | designador de fuso horário (Z ou + hh: mm ou - hh: mm) |

trans-unit.source: The format of the date and time returned by the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*> property.
trans-unit.target: O formato de data e hora retornados pelo <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>propriedade.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.SigningTime*>

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifica a assinatura digital em um certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: This method verifies the signature against an embedded X.509 certificate stored in the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.
trans-unit.target: Este método verifica a assinatura em um certificado x.&509; incorporado armazenado em <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Se a verificação for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, uma da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> valores que identifica um problema.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>

trans-unit.source: Verifies the digital signature against a given X.509 certificate.
trans-unit.target: Verifica a assinatura digital em um determinado certificado x.&509;.

trans-unit.source: The signer's X.509 certificate to verify the digital signature against.
trans-unit.target: O certificado do assinante x.&509; para verificar a assinatura digital em.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> if the verification succeeded; otherwise, one of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref> values that identifies a problem.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"></xref>Se a verificação for bem-sucedida; Caso contrário, uma da <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult"> </xref> valores que identifica um problema.

trans-unit.source: The digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*> has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: O digital <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>foi excluído.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature.Signature*>
